Include libraries and settings

```{r echo=FALSE}
source("graphs.R")
library(RCurl)
require(scales)
library("caret")
source("collect_experiments.R")
```

We get a list of links to experiments results:

```{r echo=FALSE}
GOOGLE_SPREADSHEET_URL <-"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1DR4_TytGVSE-KyaZGiSpRmd8Ep-wMotK1JxPcPkNBXg/edit#gid=0"
experiments <- collectFromGoogleSpreadsheet(GOOGLE_SPREADSHEET_URL)
experiments$evaluation_url <- as.character(experiments$evaluation_url)
```

## Experiments:

```{r results='asis', echo=FALSE, fig.keep='all',fig.width=24, fig.height=8}
execution_data <- FALSE
for (i in 1:nrow(experiments)){
	experiment <- collectFromGoogleSpreadsheet(experiments[i,"evaluation_url"])
	experiment <- reformatExperimentData(experiment)
	experiment <- filterEvaluation(experiment)

	print(experiments[i,c("title","condition")])

	gr1 <- plotTimeline(experiment)
	gr2 <- plotHistogram(experiment)
	gr3 <- plotDotsDurationVSIndexAccuracy(experiment)
	
	gr <- multiplot(gr1, gr2, gr3, cols=3)
	print(gr)
}
```
